content:
ArrowStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies styles for an arrow annotation.

In this Article

public enum ArrowStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ArrowStyle

Fields

DoubleArrow

An arrow that points in two directions.
Simple

A simple one-pointed arrow.
Tailed

An arrow with a tail.
